result.markdown:
--- title: "Hands-On Exercise 5e (Treemap Visualisation with R)" author: "Zanelle Lee Wenfang" date-modified: "last-modified" execute: echo: true eval: true warning: false freeze: true --- ### Installing R packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} pacman::p_load(treemap, treemapify, tidyverse) ``` ::: ### Importing data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} realis2018 <- read_csv("Data files/realis2018.csv") ``` ::: ### Grouped summaries ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #without the Pipe realis2018_grouped <- group_by(realis2018, `Project Name`, `Planning Region`, `Planning Area`, `Property Type`, `Type of Sale`) realis2018_summarised <- summarise(realis2018_grouped, `Total Unit Sold` = sum(`No. of Units`, na.rm = TRUE), `Total Area` = sum(`Area (sqm)`, na.rm = TRUE), `Median Unit Price ($ psm)` = median(`Unit Price ($ psm)`, na.rm = TRUE), `Median Transacted Price` = median(`Transacted Price ($)`, na.rm = TRUE)) #with the Pipe realis2018_summarised <- realis2018 %>% group_by(`Project Name`,`Planning Region`, `Planning Area`, `Property Type`, `Type of Sale`) %>% summarise(`Total Unit Sold` = sum(`No. of Units`, na.rm = TRUE), `Total Area` = sum(`Area (sqm)`, na.rm = TRUE), `Median Unit Price ($ psm)` = median(`Unit Price ($ psm)`, na.rm = TRUE), `Median Transacted Price` = median(`Transacted Price ($)`, na.rm = TRUE)) ``` ::: ### Designing Static Treemap ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #plotting a treemap realis2018_selected <- realis2018_summarised %>% filter(`Property Type` == "Condominium", `Type of Sale` == "Resale") #using basic arguments treemap(realis2018_selected, index=c("Planning Region", "Planning Area", "Project Name"), vSize="Total Unit Sold", vColor="Median Unit Price ($ psm)", title="Resale Condominium by Planning Region and Area, 2017", title.legend = "Median Unit Price (S$ per sq. m)" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #using vcolor and type arguments treemap(realis2018_selected, index=c("Planning Region", "Planning Area", "Project Name"), vSize="Total Unit Sold", vColor="Median Unit Price ($ psm)", type = "value", title="Resale Condominium by Planning Region and Area, 2017", title.legend = "Median Unit Price (S$ per sq. m)" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-2.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Colours in treemap ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #"value" type treemap treemap(realis2018_selected, index=c("Planning Region", "Planning Area", "Project Name"), vSize="Total Unit Sold", vColor="Median Unit Price ($ psm)", type="value", palette="RdYlBu", title="Resale Condominium by Planning Region and Area, 2017", title.legend = "Median Unit Price (S$ per sq. m)" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #"manual" type treemap treemap(realis2018_selected, index=c("Planning Region", "Planning Area", "Project Name"), vSize="Total Unit Sold", vColor="Median Unit Price ($ psm)", type="manual", palette="RdYlBu", title="Resale Condominium by Planning Region and Area, 2017", title.legend = "Median Unit Price (S$ per sq. m)" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-2.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Treemap layout ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #algorithm argument treemap(realis2018_selected, index=c("Planning Region", "Planning Area", "Project Name"), vSize="Total Unit Sold", vColor="Median Unit Price ($ psm)", type="manual", palette="Blues", algorithm = "squarified", title="Resale Condominium by Planning Region and Area, 2017", title.legend = "Median Unit Price (S$ per sq. m)" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #using sortID treemap(realis2018_selected, index=c("Planning Region", "Planning Area", "Project Name"), vSize="Total Unit Sold", vColor="Median Unit Price ($ psm)", type="manual", palette="Blues", algorithm = "pivotSize", sortID = "Median Transacted Price", title="Resale Condominium by Planning Region and Area, 2017", title.legend = "Median Unit Price (S$ per sq. m)" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-2.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Designing treemap using treemapify package ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #basic treemap ggplot(data=realis2018_selected, aes(area = `Total Unit Sold`, fill = `Median Unit Price ($ psm)`), layout = "scol", start = "bottomleft") + geom_treemap() + scale_fill_gradient(low = "light blue", high = "blue") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #group by planning region ggplot(data=realis2018_selected, aes(area = `Total Unit Sold`, fill = `Median Unit Price ($ psm)`), layout = "scol", start = "bottomleft") + geom_treemap() + scale_fill_gradient(low = "light blue", high = "blue") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-2.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #group by planning area ggplot(data=realis2018_selected, aes(area = `Total Unit Sold`, fill = `Median Unit Price ($ psm)`, subgroup = `Planning Region`, subgroup2 = `Planning Area`)) + geom_treemap() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-3.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #adding boundary line ggplot(data=realis2018_selected, aes(area = `Total Unit Sold`, fill = `Median Unit Price ($ psm)`, subgroup = `Planning Region`, subgroup2 = `Planning Area`)) + geom_treemap() + geom_treemap_subgroup2_border(colour = "gray40", size = 2) + geom_treemap_subgroup_border(colour = "gray20") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-4.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Designing interactive treemap using d3treeR #### Installing packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} install.packages("devtools", repos = "https://cran.r-project.org") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` package 'devtools' successfully unpacked and MD5 sums checked The downloaded binary packages are in C:\Users\Zanelle\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpeozWmY\downloaded_packages ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(devtools) install_github("timelyportfolio/d3treeR") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` cli (3.6.3 -> 3.6.4 ) [CRAN] XML (NA -> 3.99-0.18) [CRAN] gridSVG (NA -> 1.7-5 ) [CRAN] data.tree (NA -> 1.1.0 ) [CRAN] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` There is a binary version available but the source version is later: binary source needs_compilation cli 3.6.3 3.6.4 TRUE package 'XML' successfully unpacked and MD5 sums checked package 'gridSVG' successfully unpacked and MD5 sums checked package 'data.tree' successfully unpacked and MD5 sums checked The downloaded binary packages are in C:\Users\Zanelle\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpeozWmY\downloaded_packages ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` ── R CMD build ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── * checking for file 'C:\Users\Zanelle\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpeozWmY\remotes3f0c576b3499\d3treeR-d3treeR-ebb833d/DESCRIPTION' ... OK * preparing 'd3treeR': * checking DESCRIPTION meta-information ... OK * checking for LF line-endings in source and make files and shell scripts * checking for empty or unneeded directories Omitted 'LazyData' from DESCRIPTION * building 'd3treeR_0.1.tar.gz' ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(d3treeR) ``` ::: #### Designing treemap ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tm <- treemap(realis2018_summarised, index=c("Planning Region", "Planning Area"), vSize="Total Unit Sold", vColor="Median Unit Price ($ psm)", type="value", title="Private Residential Property Sold, 2017", title.legend = "Median Unit Price (S$ per sq. m)" ) d3tree(tm,rootname = "Singapore" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Hands-On_Exercise_05e_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-2.png){width=672} ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
